column1: Master of Science in Family Medicine
column5: The University of Nicosia (UNIC) was the first University in the European Union to be awarded 5 QS Stars in Distance Education which makes UNIC one of the 14 universities in the world to date that have been awarded a 5-Star rating. It was the first University globally to receive triple accreditation for its online learning quality. It has been a pioneer in online/distance learning education in Europe.
column9: 18 months up to 4 years pending study full-time or part-time
